sentences.sContent: I'm proud of being brought up by gypsies.
sentences.sCn: 我为自己是吉卜赛人抚养长大的而感到自豪。

sentences.sContent: ...the largest gypsy community of any country.
sentences.sCn: …所有国家中最大的吉卜赛人社区。

synos.tran: 吉卜赛人；吉卜赛语；像吉布赛的人；歌舞剧中的歌舞队员

trans.tranCn: 吉卜赛人；吉卜赛语；像吉布赛的人；歌舞剧中的歌舞队员
trans.tranOther: A gypsy is a member of a race of people who travel from place to place, usually in caravans, rather than living in one place. Some people find this word offensive.

trans.tranCn: 象吉卜赛人的；吉卜赛人的；无照的
